body:
Comment 4 by **yusuf.simonson**: 
To be precise, it freezes at the time of reference, so it doesn't even get to calling
println(). I could replace the println statement with, say, an assignment statement, and
it will still freeze there.

I just tested this out by dropping in a println before and after the reference. As
expected, the first println will work and the second one is never reached.
